# OpenCover.PostProcess method

Updates summary and related coverage-derived data based on visit counts.

```csharp
public static void PostProcess(XDocument document, BranchOrdinal ordinal)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| document | The input report |
| ordinal | How branches are indexed. If offset values are available, those are preferred. |
